markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Prismatic Plate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1383)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 85</row>

**Price** 14,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

With its standard-grade mithral polished to a mirrorlike sheen, this _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [glamered](/Equipment.aspx?ID=286) [mithral](/Equipment.aspx?ID=144) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_ features the religious symbols of the goddesses of [the Prismatic Ray](/Deities.aspx?ID=207) pantheon—[Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16), and [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=17)—surrounded by a rainbow-colored set of gems.

<document level="2" id="action-1067" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include 1,600 gp of mithral.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Prismatic Plate

text: <title level="1" right="Item 17" pfs="Standard" > Prismatic Plate Source Grand Bazaar pg. 85 Price 14,000 gp Usage worn armor Bulk 1 Base Armor Breastplate --- With its standard-grade mithral polished to a mirrorlike sheen, this +2 resilient glamered mithral breastplate features the religious symbols of the goddesses of the Prismatic Ray pantheon—Desna, Sarenrae, and Shelyn—surrounded by a rainbow-colored set of gems. Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include 1,600 gp of mithral.
